channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report E-2024070377
item.description:
Report E-2024070377

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-18T15:13:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-24
  • City: BRATTLEBORO
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NEW ENGLAND CENTRAL RAILROAD, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Crew 606 in Brattleboro VT reported a railcar loaded with hydrochloric acid on the adjacent track leaking from the dome. Emergency responders were called to the scene, contained the leak, and released pressure from the tank to stop the leak. Less than 5 gallons leaked out. It was discovered that there was a missing gasket and a defective (worn) gasket. Hepaco did cleanup and repairs, Car Owner (Reagent Chemical) did leak test, and TRC Environmental Consulting did reporting
